/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the road, looking down the length of the highway. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the highway, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A yellow sign stands out on the right side of the road, bearing the text "京港澳高速", which translates to "G4 Beijing-Hohhot Expressway". This sign is a common sight on highways in China, indicating the location and direction of the highway. The image provides a glimpse into the bustling city life of Beijing, juxtaposed with the serene beauty of its natural surroundings.
